sentences.sContent: Is verse 75 true of Joseph? Was the LORD afflicting him? Or was it Potiphar's wife who had afflicted him?
sentences.sContent_eng: Is verse 75 true of Joseph? Was the LORD afflicting him? Or was it Potiphar's wife who had afflicted him?
sentences.sCn: 75节是约瑟的真实写照吗？是神在让他受苦吗？或者让他受苦的是波提乏的妻子？
